Uses of Interface
jade.core.sam.AverageMeasureProvider

  • Packages that use AverageMeasureProvider 
    Package Description
    jade.core.sam  

    • Uses of AverageMeasureProvider in jade.core.sam

      Classes in jade.core.sam that implement AverageMeasureProvider 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AverageMeasureProviderImpl
      A default ready-made implementation of the AverageMeasureProvider interface that offers methods to add measure samples and automatically computes an AverageMeasure when the getValue() method is called.
      Methods in jade.core.sam with parameters of type AverageMeasureProvider 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void SAMHelper.addEntityMeasureProvider(java.lang.String entityName, AverageMeasureProvider provider)
      Register a provider of average measures for a given entity
